sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: ./MAKEDEV -v generic: This creates a whole bunch of devices. Normally, these are all the devices you will need. But it is possible that some special devices needed for your hardware configuration are missing. Create these with ./MAKEDEV -v <device>. The generic-nopty option mostly creates the same devices as generic, but skips those that aren't needed if you are using devpts.
